title: Opening Command pass password option
author: dheeraj29
body_snippet:
There shall be an option to pass password to opening command if required.

Eg:- sudo su

comments.author: savornicesei
comments.snippet:

comments.author: dheeraj29
comments.snippet:
Hi @savornicesei yes, basically its a feature request or enhancement rather.

Example if sudoers file doesn't define NOPASSWD then sudo command will ask for password. So even though password is saved in connection settings, still for sudo command, we have to store and copy password from elsewhere.
